GSP31kestprau:6: yajurvit keśavaḥ prāha kiñcit sāṃkhye yathāmati // 2 //
GSP31kestprau:14_0: tathāhi vimataṃ sukhaduḥkhamohasāmānyopādānakaṃ niyamena tadanvitasvabhāvatvāt yanniyamena yadanvitasvabhāvaṃ tat tatsāmānyopādānakaṃ
GSP31kestprau:14_1: yathā mṛtsāmānyānvitasvabhāvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādi tathāhi kācana taruṇī kasyacit kāntasya sukhamutpādayati kasyacinmohaṃ
GSP31kestprau:16_0: sā ca caturviṃśatidhā prakṛteḥ prathamo mahāniti vikāraḥ pariṇāma iti yāvat mahattattvameva buddhitattvamityabhidhīyate ahamityahaṃkārākhyo
GSP31kestprau:16_1: mahattattvasya prathamo vikāraḥ tadanantaraṃ pañcatanmātrāḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhākhyā bhavati athākāśādibhūtapañcakaṃ
GSP31kestprau:16_3: śabdādyāḥ pañcatanmātrā ityetat tattvasaptakaṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ prati kāryatvamuttarottaraṃ prati kāraṇatvamityarthaḥ |
GSP31kestprau:17_0: tathāhi mahattattvaṃ mūlaprakṛteḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ cāhaṃkāratattvasya ahaṃkāratattvaṃ tathā mahattattvasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca
GSP31kestprau:17_1: śabdatattvākhyāditanmātraṃ prati tathāhi tadapi pūrvaṃ prati kāryamuttaraṃ prati kāraṇaṃ ceti bodhyam |
GSP31kestprau:18: ākāśādibhūtapañcakamekādaśendriyāṇītyete punaḥ ṣoḍaśabhāvāśca prakṛtijanyā eva na tu kasyacit prakṛtiḥ tattvāntaropādānarūpatvābhāvāt |
GSP31kestprau:20: nanu viṣayāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ cetanasambandhaḥ sākṣādevāstu kiṃ mahadādipraṇālikayeti cet |
GSP31kestprau:21: tat kiṃ citireva viṣayabandhanasvabhāvā tathā sati caityanyanityatayā mokṣaḥ kadāpi na syāt
GSP31kestprau:22: atha caitanyaṃ prakṛtau pratibimbitaṃ prakṛtiviṣayayostu sākṣāt sambandhaḥ syāt kiṃ mahadādineti cet tathāhi puruṣavannityatayā punaranirmokṣāpattireva |
GSP31kestprau:23_0: atha citirviṣayasambaddhasvabhāvā māstu viṣayā eva citisambaddhasvabhāvāḥ santu tathā ca viṣayatirobhāve mokṣaḥ syāditi cet
GSP31kestprau:23_1: tarhīdaṃ dṛṣṭamiti na syāt sarvathā citisambandhasvābhāvyenāvyavadhānāt atha viṣayā indriyadvārā citisambaddhātmānaḥ santu
GSP31kestprau:23_2: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavyavahārādi sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāmupapatsyata iti cenna vyāsaṅgānupapatteḥ indriyasambaddhe viṣaye jñānotpatterāvaśyakatvāt |
GSP31kestprau:24_0: atha vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥ kalpyatāṃ kimahaṃkāreṇa maivaṃ evaṃ ca sati svasmin vyāghrohaṃ varāhohamiti nāropayet kiṃtvindriyaṃ
GSP31kestprau:24_1: manodvārā citisambaddhaṃ svakīyaṃ naratvameva gṛhṇīyāt athaivamahaṃkārostu svapnadaśāyāmāropārthaṃ buddhitattve na mānamasti
GSP31kestprau:24_2: maivaṃ suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ manovadahaṃkāropi nivṛttavyāpāra eva tathā ca śvāsaprayojakajīvanayoniyatnasya vyāpāraḥ syāditi
GSP31kestprau:24_3: tadanurodhena buddhitattvasyāpyāvaśyakatvāt tasmādbuddhitattvaṃ parigamena(?) sambaddho viṣayo gajaturagamahiṣādiḥ puruṣeṇa
GSP31kestprau:24_4: caitanyena sambadhyate tata āsaṃsārabuddhitattvanāśādeva ca mokṣa iti nānirmokṣaḥ |
GSP31kestprau:25_0: akāraṇamakāryaṃ ca kūṭasthacaitanyarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotiriti śrutyā tāvat svaprakāśamātmano 'bhidhīyate
GSP31kestprau:25_1: svaprakāśaṃ ca vijñānameva tenātmanaḥ svaprakāśatvamabhidadhatīyaṃ śrutirvijñānātmakatāṃ puruṣasyāvedayati |
GSP31kestprau:26_0: na ca kṣaṇikasya jñānasya nityapuruṣātmakatvaṃ sambhavatīti jñānasya kṣaṇabhaṅguratvāsiddheḥ vināśavyavahārasya tava ghaṭākāśadivināśavyavahāravadaupādhikatvenāpyupapatteḥ
GSP31kestprau:26_1: puruṣātiriktacaitanyasvīkartustavāpi mate jñānasya kṣaṇikatve mānābhāvaḥ anyathā kālāntare 'nubhūtasmaraṇānupapattiḥ |
GSP31kestprau:27_0: na ca saṃskāro dvāraṃ tatkalpanāpekṣayā jñānasya sthairyakalpanāyāṃ lāghavāt nityatvāccāsau na kasyacidvikāraḥ na vā kāraṇaṃ
GSP31kestprau:27_1: svaprakāśatvāt yadi hi svaprakāśasyāpyasya prakṛtitvamāśrīyate tarhyetadvikṛtitvenābhimatasyāpi svaprakāśatvamasya vā jaḍatvamāpadyeta
GSP31kestprau:27_2: samānayoreva prakṛtivikṛtibhāvopalambhāt bhedāgrahācca niṣkriyepi puruṣe kartṛtvābhimānaḥ evaṃ sukhaduḥkhādivyavahāropi tathāhi
GSP31kestprau:30: pratipadyate tataścetaretarādhyāsādantaḥkaraṇāvṛttīnāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ puruṣe puruṣadharmāṇāṃ ciccaitanyādīnāmantaḥkaraṇe 'dhyāsādahaṃ
GSP31kestprau:32: avidyānāmātāttvikī khyātiḥ sā ca tamoguṇodrekādāvirbhavantī viviktayostādātmyamavabhāsayati
GSP31kestprau:36: na ca kopyasya vyāpāra iti ālocanaṃ tāvadindriyavyāpāraḥ vikalpastu manasaḥ abhimānohaṃkārasya kṛtyadhyavasāyo buddheḥ |
GSP31kestprau:37: atha kṛtyadhyavasāyaḥ kṛtimattayā jñānaṃ tatkathamacetanāyā buddheriti buddhiraṃśatrayavatī puruṣoparāgo viṣayoparāgo vyāpārāveśaśceti |
GSP31kestprau:38_0: bhavati hi mamedaṃ kartavyamiti tatra mametyaṃśaścetanasya darpaṇanirmalāyā buddheḥ pratibimba upadhānaṃ taccātāttvikameva
GSP31kestprau:38_1: caitanyena buddhervāstavasambandhābhāvāt yathā darpaṇaṃ mukhasambandhamantareṇāpi puruṣabhramastadvadihāpi |
GSP31kestprau:39_0: idamiti viṣayopadhānaṃ tacca vāstavameka indriyapraṇālikayā buddhau jñānarūpaviṣayasambandhāt darpaṇasyeva niḥśvāsābhihatasya
GSP31kestprau:39_1: malinimā pāramārthikaḥ puruṣoparāgaḥ viṣayoparāgamāhimnā ca kṛtimattayādhyavasāyaḥ ayameva vyāpārāveśaḥ |
GSP31kestprau:40_0: atha jñānameva caitanyaṃ kathamanayorbheda iti ucyate kṛtyadhyavasāyalakṣaṇavyāpāraviśiṣṭā buddhirindriyapraṇālikayā buddherviṣayasya
GSP31kestprau:40_1: ghaṭādeḥ sambandho vṛttiviśeṣastadeva jñānaṃ viṣayoparāgeṇa saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātāttvikaḥ sambandhaḥ sa upalabdhiḥ yathā
GSP31kestprau:40_2: darpaṇaniṣṭhā malinimā darpaṇapratibimbitamukhe dṛśyate tatheti yāvat |
GSP31kestprau:42: tadeva jñānaṃ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmādharmarūpā aṣṭau bhāvā buddhereva ahaṃ jāne sukhītyādisāmānādhikaraṇyapratīteḥ |
GSP31kestprau:43: nanu yatraite dharmāḥ sa eva cetanaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cenna anityadharmarūpatayā pariṇāmitvāt dharmadharmiṇorabhedāt |
GSP31kestprau:44: ye punastayorbhedaṃ pratipannāstārkikaprabhṛtayaste tāvannīlo ghaṭā ityādyabhedāvagāhipratyayamapaśyanta upekṣaṇīyāḥ |
GSP31kestprau:45: nanu pradhānasyācaitanyasya kathaṃ jagatkartṛtvaṃ yat khalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādi |
GSP31kestprau:46_0: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmarūpeṇa vyākṛtaṃ tasmāccetanakartṛkamiti sambhāvyate cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭā iti
GSP31kestprau:46_1: nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati ata eva ghaṭasya nivartyasyāpyantaḥsaṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvo
GSP31kestprau:47_0: atra vadāmaḥ caitanyasya jagadupādānatve jagato jaḍatvānupapattiḥ yat kāryaṃ taccetanakartṛkamiti vyāptyā śarīrī kartā syāt
GSP31kestprau:47_1: kiṃ ca tathāpi jñānasya caitanyaviśiṣṭasya kṣityādijanakatve mānābhāvaḥ kulālādijñānecchayoḥ kṛtijanakatvenaivānyathāsiddhatvāt
GSP31kestprau:48: atha yaḥ kṛtimān sa jñānavāniti vyāptyā tatsiddhiḥ evaṃ hi yo jñānavān sa sukhītyādivyāptyā sukhamapīśvare syāt aprayojakatvaṃ cet tulyaṃ tavāpi |
GSP31kestprau:49_0: karmaiva jagatkāraṇamityapi ye pratipannāste tāvannatyantaṃ pārihartavyāḥ dharmādharmātmakārthānarthalakṣaṇacodanālakṣaṇasya
GSP31kestprau:49_1: prakṛtyabhedāt buddhyākārapariṇatāyā eva prakṛteraṣṭau bhāvā ityabhyupagamāt /
GSP31kestprau:54: athātītānāgatayoḥ kathaṃ liṅgabhāvaḥ jātyā dharmādharmātmanā tatsattvāt |
GSP31kestprau:60_0: tathāhi vimatāni śarīrāṇi svasaṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyātmavanti śarīratvāt sampratipannavat kiṃ caivaṃ yathaikasminneva jīvati devadatte
GSP31kestprau:60_1: śarīre jāte vā ceṣṭāvati vā mṛte vā bhāvopi jātaceṣṭāvān mṛtaḥ kileti loko vyavaharati tathā śarīrāntarepi tathaiva vyavahārāt
GSP31kestprau:60_2: tasmāt puruṣabhedobhyupeyaḥ ekamevādvitīyamityādiśruteśca kathañcidupacaritārthatvena tathā ātmano hi vibhuniyatvādabhinnadeśakālā
GSP31kestprau:62_0: kiṃ punarasya prayojanaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ kiṃ tat akhilānarthamūlabhūtāyā avidyāyāḥ sattvātiśayaviśeṣāvirbhūtavidyayā vināśe sati
GSP31kestprau:62_1: tatpuruṣasya sahajacaitanyātmanāvasthānaṃ tanmokṣāparaparyāyaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ prakṛtipuruṣavivekajñānaṃ ca taddhetuḥ /
GSP31kestprau:63: nanu prakṛternityatvāt punarapi tamodrekasambhavādavidyāvirbhāvasambhave muktipracyutiḥ syāditi
GSP31kestprau:65: yadāhuḥ sa tu dīrghakālanairantaryasatkārasevito dṛḍhabhūmirvyutthānasaṃskāreṇa na bādhyata iti |
GSP31kestprau:66: atha nirlepasyāsya mahāpuruṣasya sambandha eva na kuto 'pavarga iti satyamāha kiṃ tu prakṛtereva bandhamokṣau puṃsyupacaryete tadāhuḥ |
GSP31kestprau:69_1: saptabhī rūpaiḥ prakṛtirātmanaivātmānaṃ badhnāti ekarūpeṇa jñānākhyena ca vimocayatīti |
